pageProps.body:
LIinearity Of Mean And Variance

let x1,x2,...,xnx_1,x_2,...,x_nx1​,x2​,...,xn​ is a random draw. let xˉ=Σi=1..nxi/n\bar{x}= \Sigma_{i=1..n}x_i/nxˉ=Σi=1..n​xi​/n let E[x]=μE[x]=\muE[x]=μ what is E[xˉ]E[\bar{x}]E[xˉ]? E[xˉ]=E[Σi=1..nxi/n]=1/nE[Σi=1..nxi]=1/n∗nE[x]=μE[\bar{x}] = E[\Sigma_{i=1..n}x_i/n]=1/n E[\Sigma_{i=1..n}x_i] = 1/n*nE[x] = \muE[xˉ]=E[Σi=1..n​xi​/n]=1/nE[Σi=1..n​xi​]=1/n∗nE[x]=μ $Var(\bar{x}) = E[(\bar{x}-E[\bar{x}])^2] = $

E[(x−E[x])2]=E[x2−2xE[x]+E[x]2]=E[x2]−2E[xE[x]]+E[x]2=E[x2]−E[x]2E[(x-E[x])^2]=E[x^2-2xE[x]+E[x]^2] = E[x^2]-2E[xE[x]]+E[x]^2 = E[x^2] - E[x]^2E[(x−E[x])2]=E[x2−2xE[x]+E[x]2]=E[x2]−2E[xE[x]]+E[x]2=E[x2]−E[x]2

$E(\bar{x}^2) = E[\bar{x}]^2+Var[\bar{x}] $

Variance of Linear Combinations

Let X1,X2,...,XnX_1,X_2,...,X_nX1​,X2​,...,Xn​ are independent random variables with means μ1,μ2,...,μn\mu_1,\mu_2,...,\mu_nμ1​,μ2​,...,μn​ and variances σ12,σ22,...,σn2\sigma_1^2,\sigma_2^2,...,\sigma_n^2σ12​,σ22​,...,σn2​.

Then: Linearity of variance

  1. E[Σi=1..nαiXi]=Σi=1..nαiμiE[\Sigma_{i=1..n}\alpha_iX_i] =\Sigma_{i=1..n}\alpha_i\mu_iE[Σi=1..n​αi​Xi​]=Σi=1..n​αi​μi​
  2. Var[Σi=1..nαiXi]=Σi=1..nαi2σi2Var[\Sigma_{i=1..n}\alpha_iX_i] =\Sigma_{i=1..n}\alpha_i^2\sigma_i^2Var[Σi=1..n​αi​Xi​]=Σi=1..n​αi2​σi2​

Proof:

The expectation is obvious.

First, let's show that independence implies Cov(X,Y)=0Cov(X,Y) = 0Cov(X,Y)=0 Independence implies: E(XY)=E(Y)E(X)E(XY) = E(Y)E(X)E(XY)=E(Y)E(X)

Then:

Cov(X,Y)=E[(X−E[X])(Y−E[Y])]=E(XY−E[X]Y−E[Y]X−E[Y]E[X])=E[XY]−E[X∗E[Y]]−E[Y∗E[X]]+E[X]E[Y]=E[X]E[Y]−E[X]E[Y]−E[X]E[Y]+E[X]E[Y]=0Cov(X,Y) = E[(X-E[X])(Y-E[Y])] = E(XY-E[X]Y-E[Y]X-E[Y]E[X]) = \\ E[XY] - E[X*E[Y]]-E[Y*E[X]] +E[X]E[Y] = \\ E[X]E[Y] -E[X]E[Y]-E[X]E[Y]+E[X]E[Y]=0Cov(X,Y)=E[(X−E[X])(Y−E[Y])]=E(XY−E[X]Y−E[Y]X−E[Y]E[X])=E[XY]−E[X∗E[Y]]−E[Y∗E[X]]+E[X]E[Y]=E[X]E[Y]−E[X]E[Y]−E[X]E[Y]+E[X]E[Y]=0

For Var:

Var(Σi=1..nαiXi)=E[Σi=1..nΣi=1..maiaj(Xi−μi)(Xj−μj)]=E[Σ(ai2(E([Xi−μ)2])−2∗ai∗aj(E[Xi]−μi)(E[Xj]−μj)]−E[Σai2∗Var(Xi)+0]=Σi=1..nαi2σi2Var(\Sigma_{i=1..n}\alpha_iX_i) =E[\Sigma_{i=1..n}\Sigma_{i=1..m} a_i a_j(X_i-\mu_i)(X_j-\mu_j)] = \\ E[\Sigma(a_i^2(E([X_i-\mu)^2])-2*a_i*a_j(E[X_i]-\mu_i)(E[X_j]-\mu_j)] - \\ E[\Sigma{a_i^2*Var(X_i)+0}] = \Sigma_{i=1..n}\alpha_i^2\sigma_i^2Var(Σi=1..n​αi​Xi​)=E[Σi=1..n​Σi=1..m​ai​aj​(Xi​−μi​)(Xj​−μj​)]=E[Σ(ai2​(E([Xi​−μ)2])−2∗ai​∗aj​(E[Xi​]−μi​)(E[Xj​]−μj​)]−E[Σai2​∗Var(Xi​)+0]=Σi=1..n​αi2​σi2​

Where we used that E[(Xi−μi)(Xj−μj)]=0E[(X_i-\mu_i)(X_j-\mu_j)] = 0E[(Xi​−μi​)(Xj​−μj​)]=0 if i≠ji\ne ji=j.
